overview: This high school offers every type of course for the discerning student who wants to learn, but it also offers up some Intimate Courses for those boys who just want to suck cock and fuck 'til they cum! The teachers coach their pupils with some very in-depth and extremely personal tuition, whilst their fellow classmates are only too happy to continue studying their course-work at home in the privacy of their bedroom where they can practice their proficiency in cock sucking, their ass tonguing skills and finally their prowess in back door banging. These Intimate Courses are really paying off!
title: Intimate Courses
